column1: Art Institute of Chicago////I have always loved this place growing up. My boyfriend and I recently came back and WOW I forgot how huge this place is. Granted we were in time crunch but
column2: there's so much to see. Classics
column5: this place has it all! We will have to come back when we have the whole day to kill but
column6: if you love art or you're out of town..please stop in!
